text: Wisdom Airways was a regional airline operating in North-Western Thailand, with a base in Chiang Mai. On May 13th, 2019, the airline suspended all of its operations temporarily and in August 2019 it seems to reoperated, and resuspended on October 1, 2019. == History == The airline sought to take over the routes of Kan Air after it went out of business. Although the airline employed the same pilots and operated the same routes as Kan Air, it denied any links to it. The airline began operations on 1 December 2017. On October 1st, 2019, the airline announced on their official Facebook page that they would be suspending all operations until further notice. == Fleet == The airline operated several Cessna 208 Caravan aircraft, including HS-WIA and HS- WIS. It also had plans to acquire a larger aircraft, a DHC-6 Twin Otter. == Destinations == On 25 June 2018, the airline began operating a route between Chiang Mai and Mae Hong Son. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Defunct airlines of Thailand Category:Airlines established in 2017 Category:Airlines disestablished in 2019 Category:2019 disestablishments in Thailand Category:Airlines articles needing expert attention Category:Start- Class_airline_articles Category:Thai companies established in 2017
title: Wisdom Airways
